key.summary: Whether to warn the operator if telemetry is disabled in iNav

key.description: Defines RGBA colour for 'next way point' highlight

key.description: If a dataflash is configured for black box, and this key is non-zero, a warning in generated if the data flash is greater than "flash-warn" percent full.
